plot: Obsessed with the foot apparel hidden in the attic floor, our hero ventures out into a silent, neo-noir world, to discover that not everyone shares his enthusiasm for his Wingtip shoes.
title: Wingtips
plot_es: Obsessed with the foot apparel hidden in the attic floor, our hero ventures out into a silent, neo-noir world, to discover that not everyone shares his enthusiasm for his Wingtip shoes.
plot_en: Obsessed with the foot apparel hidden in the attic floor, our hero ventures out into a silent, neo-noir world, to discover that not everyone shares his enthusiasm for his Wingtip shoes.
